en.title: Tap & Build: Idle Factory Tycoon - Free Clicker Game for Android
en.metaDescription: Build your factory empire in Tap & Build! Free idle clicker game with 14 generators, prestige system, daily challenges & global leaderboards.
en.metaKeywords: idle game, clicker game, factory tycoon, android game, free game, incremental game, tap game
en.ogTitle: Tap & Build: Idle Factory Tycoon - Build Your Empire
en.ogDescription: Build your factory empire! Tap, automate, and expand with 14 generators. Earn coins offline in this addictive idle clicker game. 100% FREE!
en.twitterTitle: Tap & Build: Build Your Factory Empire
en.twitterDescription: The ultimate idle clicker experience! Build, automate, and expand your factory while earning offline. 14 generators â€¢ Prestige System â€¢ Free
en.heroSubtitle: The ultimate idle factory tycoon. Start with a simple conveyor belt and grow into a cosmic factory empire spanning dimensions! Tap to earn, automate with managers, and dominate the leaderboards.
en.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to build an unstoppable factory empire
en.feature1Desc: From conveyor belts to quantum factories and dimensional rifts. Unlock machines that produce coins while you sleep!
en.feature2Desc: Create combos for massive multipliers. Auto-tap managers work for you while you're away!
en.feature3Desc: Reset your progress to earn powerful prestige points. Each prestige makes you stronger with permanent multipliers!
en.feature4Desc: 20+ upgrades across 4 branches: Production, Tap, Offline, and Luck. Customize your strategy!
en.feature5Desc: Recruit specialists who automate production, boost earnings, and unlock special abilities.
en.feature6Desc: Compete with players worldwide! Create friend rooms for private competitions.
en.feature7Desc: 28-day calendar with increasing rewards. Daily and weekly challenges for extra coins.
en.feature8Desc: Your factories never stop! Come back to collect hours of offline earnings. Perfect for casual players.
en.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of players building their factory empires. 100% Free.
en.alphaSubtitle: Be among the first to test new features and shape the future of Tap & Build.
en.alphaError: Please enter a valid Gmail address (@gmail.com)
en.alphaHelper: Enter the Gmail address linked to your Google Play Store account. We'll use this to grant you alpha access.
en.alphaSuccessText: We'll send you an invite when the next alpha build is ready. Keep an eye on your inbox!
en.faq1A: Tap & Build is a free idle factory tycoon game for Android. Tap to earn coins, buy 14 unique generators, prestige for multipliers, and compete on global leaderboards. Features include a live market, managers, ascension perks, daily challenges, and offline earnings.
en.faq2Q: Is Tap & Build free to play?
en.faq2A: Yes! Tap & Build is completely free to download and play. Optional in-app purchases are available to remove ads and get bonus features, but all game content is accessible for free.
en.faq3A: Yes! Your factories continue producing even when you're not playing. Come back after hours or days and collect all your offline earnings.
en.faq4A: Once you've earned enough currency, you can prestige to reset your progress in exchange for prestige points. These provide permanent multipliers and unlock powerful ascension perks.
en.footerTagline: The ultimate idle factory tycoon. Build, automate, prestige, dominate.
en.footerCopyright: Â© 2026 Habbi Games. All rights reserved.
en.altMarket: Live Market - Stock trading interface in Tap & Build
en.altPrestige: Prestige System - Reset for permanent multipliers
